@poozipotti 2 examples at opposite ends of the JAM spectrum: https://t.co/mz6v9ZFqQI is a marketing site & blog which is all pre-rendered (then enhanced with JS to @algolia API for search) https://t.co/3O0CdUxKvF is a @reactjs app, served statically. With lots of client-side APIs for data.
